imp.core.commands.definition

Class XSlideCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • imp.core.commands.definition.DeclarationCommand
      • imp.core.commands.definition.PrismCommand
        • imp.core.commands.definition.XSlideCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command

    public class XSlideCommand
extends PrismCommand
    Class for implementing the command used to create an XSlide joint to link together two bodies. The execute method would be the same as in the slide command which it extends.
    Version:
    1.01
    Author:
    dykstran

      XSlideCommand(java.lang.String bodyNameBefore, java.lang.String bodyNameAfter, java.lang.String jointName)
      Method for collecting the data to be used in the execute method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XSlideCommand

        public XSlideCommand(java.lang.String bodyNameBefore,
             java.lang.String bodyNameAfter,
             java.lang.String jointName)
              throws NullParameterException,
                     SelfLoopException
        Method for collecting the data to be used in the execute method.
        Parameters:
        bodyNameBefore - The first body being linked.
        bodyNameAfter - The second body being linked.
        jointName - The name of the XSlide.
        Throws:
        NullParameterException - This is thrown if any of the parameters are Null Values.
        SelfLoopException - Thrown if the command attempts to create a joint linking a body to itself.
